ModMetaData.name: RePower Rimmu-Nation Patch
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Patches Rimmu-Nation benches for using the RePower system:
RN Apparel bench (10W Idle, 250W Active) RN CQB bench (10W Idle, 250W Active) RN Rifleman bench (10W Idle, 250W Active) RN Marksman bench (10W Idle, 250W Active) RN Heavy bench (10W Idle, 250W Active) RN Mini tailor (10W Idle, 180W Active)
Support-chat here: https://s.team/chat/KUDuzMGR
